[Page Title: All Day Menu - DIG In the Park, N. Charleston, SC]

All Day Menu
Download our complete All Day Menu menu (PDF). 
APPETIZERS

LOADED NACHOS

Tortilla chips topped with queso, shredded lettuce, black beans, jalapeños, fresh pico & sour cream
Price: 10.99 Price: Add Chicken 6 Price: Add Chili 5 Price: Add Pork 5 Price: Add Steak 7 Price: Add Shrimp 7 
BING BANG BOOM SHRIMP

Breaded, lightly fried & served with a sweet & spicy chili sauce
Price: 10.99 
CHEESE CURDS

Fried garlic herb cheese curds, served with marinara
Price: 9.99 
QUESO DIP

House-made cheese sauce with diced peppers, onions, & tomatoes, served with tortilla chips
Price: 8.99 
SOUTHWEST SPRING ROLLS

House-made spring rolls with chicken, black beans, corn, bell peppers, & cheese. Served with sweet & spicy chili sauce
Price: 11.99 
JUMBO PRETZEL

Jumbo sized, sweet bavarian pretzel, baked & served with queso or spicy mustard
Price: 10.99 
CHEESE QUESADILLA

Melted mozzarella & cheddar cheese, served with fresh pico & sour cream
Price: 8.99 Price: Add Chicken 6 Price: Add Shrimp 7 Price: Add Steak 7 
BUFFALO CAULIFLOWER

Breaded, lightly fried & tossed in buffalo sauce
Price: 9.99 
FRIED PICKLES

Breaded pickle chips, fried & served with a spicy ranch dipping sauce
Price: 8.99 
LOADED TOTCHOS

Tater tots topped with queso, bacon bits, shredded lettuce, & ranch dressing
Price: 10.99 
CHICKEN TENDERS

Hand breaded tenders served with honey mustard & a choice of side
Price: 13.99 
SALADS

DRESSINGS

Ranch - Blue Cheese - Caesar - Balsamic Vinaigrette - Honey Mustard - Spicy Ranch - Itailan - Cucumber Wasabi

SOUTHWEST SALAD

Blackened chicken, iceberg lettuce, diced onions, black beans, jalapeños, fresh pico, shredded cheddar cheese & sour cream
Price: 14.99 
CHEF SALAD

Mixed greens, tomatoes, bacon bits, hard-boiled egg, ham, turkey & swiss cheese
Price: 15.99 
AHI TUNA SALAD

Seared tuna, edamame, shredded carrots, roasted tomatoes, & pickled onion. Topped with sesame seeds & a wasabi aioli dressing
Price: 17.99 
HOUSE SALAD

Mixed greens, shredded carrots, tomatoes, red onions, cucumbers & croutons
Price: 8.99 
CAESAR SALAD

Chopped romain lettuce tossed in caesar dressing & parmesan cheese, topped with croutons
Price: 8.99 
SALAD ADDITIONS

ADD: CHICKEN 6 - SHRIMP 7

BOWLS

SANTA FE CHICKEN BOWL

Grilled chicken, rice, black bean corn salsa, avocado, fresh cilantro & chipotle sour cream
Price: 14.99 
CHIPOTLE SHRIMP BOWL

Grilled shrimp, rice, black beans, red onion, fresh pico, shredded lettuce, green onions & chipotle sour cream
Price: 15.99 
TERIYAKI STEAK BOWL*

Double shaved steak, glazed in teriyaki sauce, cilantro lime rice, shredded cheddar cheese, tomatoes, onion, bell peppers, & fresh cilantro
Price: 15.99 
AHI TUNA BOWL

Seared tuna, cilantro lime rice, edamame, shredded carrotts, roasted tomatoes, & pickled onion. Topped with sesame seeds & a cucumber wasabi dressing
Price: 17.99 
TACOS

Served on corn or flour tortilla, Two Tacos & a Choice of Side

BUFFALO SHRIMP TACOS

Grilled or fried shrimp tossed in buffalo sauce, blue cheese crumbles, coleslaw, tomatoes & red onions
Price: 15.99 
AHI TUNA TACOS

Seared tuna, edamame, shredded carrots, roasted tomatoes, & pickled onion. Topped with sesame seed & a wasabi aioli dressing
Price: 17.99 
STEAK TACOS*

Double shaved steak, shredded cheddar, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, fresh cilantro & sour cream
Price: 15.99 
CHICKEN TACOS

Blackened chicken, black bean corn salsa, shredded lettuce, fresh cilantro, & chipotle sour cream
Price: 14.99 
HAWAIIAN PORK TACOS

Pulled pork, house-made BBQ, pineapple salsa, shredded lettuce & cilantro
Price: 14.99 
BURGERS

*All burgers can be made with grilled chicken, fried chicken or as a black bean patty. Served on a brioche bun with lettuce, tomato, & onion.*

BRUNCH BURGER*

American cheese, applewood smoked bacon, & a sunny side up egg
Price: 16.99 
PIMENTO BURGER*

Pimento cheese & applewood smoked bacon
Price: 15.99 
HAWAIIAN BURGER*

Pineapple salsa, sliced ham, swiss cheese & teryiaki glaze
Price: 15.99 
MUSHROOM & SWISS BURGER*

Sautéed mushrooms, caramelized onions & swiss cheese
Price: 15.99 
DIG SCHOLAR BURGER*

House-made bbq sauce, applewood smoked bacon, american cheese & fried onion tanglers. $1 goes to the DIG annual scholarship program.
Price: 15.99 
SMASHBURGER

Two smash patties, topped with honey srircha, & american cheese
Price: 14.99 
BLACKENED BLUE BURGER*

Blackened beef patty, blue cheese crumbles, & fried onion tanglers
Price: 15.99 
CALI BURGER*

Cheddar cheese, applewood smoked bacon, jalapeños & avocado
Price: 16.99 
CLASSIC BURGER*

Plain hamburger cooked to temperature
Price: 13.99 Price: Add Cheese .99 Price: Add Bacon 1.99 
SIDES

Fries - Tater Tots - Kettle Chips - Coleslaw For 1.99: Sweet Potato Fries - Mixed Vegetable - Side Salad

SANDWICHES

TURKEY AVOCADO WRAP

Turkey, swiss cheese, avocado, lettuce, tomato & ranch dressing. Served in a tomato basil wrap
Price: 15.99 
PULLED PORK SANDWICH

Pulled pork slow roasted in house, topped with our house-made bbq sauce & a side of slaw
Price: 13.99 
BUFFALO CHICKEN WRAP

Hand-breaded chicken, served in a tomato basil wrap with lettuce, tomato, onion, buffalo sauce, & a choice of either ranch or blue cheese dressing
Price: 14.99 
CLUB SANDWICH

Ham, turkey, swiss cheese & applewood smoked bacon layered between two thick slices of challah bread with lettuce, tomato, onion&dijonaise
Price: 15.99 
CUBAN SANDWICH

Pulled pork, ham, Swiss cheese, pickles & spicy mustard on a grilled hoagie roll
Price: 14.99 
PHILLY CHEESE STEAK

Double shaved steak, onions & peppers served on a hoagie roll & topped with our house-made queso cheese
Price: 15.99 
GYRO

Choose lamb or grilled chicken, served on warm pita bread with shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, onions, feta cheese & house-made tzatziki sauce
Price: 14.99 
SHRIMP PO BOY

Poached shrimp, roasted tomatoes, & green onion. Served on a new england style roll, topped with a lemon aioli dressing
Price: 15.99 
SIDES

Fries - Tater Tots - Kettle Chips - Coleslaw For 1.99: Sweet Potato Fries - Mixed Vegetable - Side Salad

WINGS

Served with ranch or blue cheese dressing & celery

TRADITIONAL JUMBO WINGS

Mild - Medium - Hot - Reaper - Bbq Teriyaki - Spicy Garlic - Sweet & Spicy Garlic Parmesan - Mango Habanaro. Dry Rubs: Smokey Paprika - Mesquite - Lemon Pepper
Price: 6 Wings 11.99 Price: 12 Wings 22.99 
SIDES

FRIES 3.99 TATER TOTS 3.99SLAW 3.99KETTLE CHIPS 3.99

SWEET POTATO FRIES 5.99

MIXED VEGETABLE 3.99DIG CHILI -  CUP 5.99 / BOWL 6.99

HOT DOGS

1 Hot dog and choice of side

Add an additional dog for $3

GRILLED RIVERDOG

Plain Hot Dog
Price: 7.99 
CHILI CHEESE DOG

House-made chili, shredded cheddar & raw onions
Price: 9.99 
BRONX BOMBER

Grilled onions, sauerkraut & spicy mustard
Price: 8.99 
CHARLESTON CHEW

Topped with slaw
Price: 8.99 
*Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of food borne illness*

[Page Title: N. Charleston, SC | Events / Specials | DIG In the Park]

Events / Specials

Events This Week!

Sunday Brunch
Every Sunday , to 10:00 AM 2:00 PM 
Grab a friend and join us on Sunday for a delicious brunch.

Daily Happy Hour
Every Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday and Friday , to 4:00 PM 7:00 PM 
Join us for Happy Hour from 4pm-7pm every Monday through Friday. Includes $1 off appetizers & $1 off house liquor, domestic drafts, and house wine.

Monday Night Bingo!
Every Monday , to 6:00 PM 8:00 PM 
Join us every Monday night for Bingo!

Trivia Wednesday's
Every Wednesday , to 6:00 PM 9:00 PM 
Bring your friends and join us weekly on Wednesday's for Trivia!

Live Music
Every Tuesday and Friday , to 7:00 PM 10:00 PM 
Live music on the patio every Tuesday & Friday night!

[Page Title: N. Charleston, SC Restaurant | Home | DIG In the Park]

A neighborhood pub and sports bar in the heart of Olde Towne Park Circle, North Charleston

Once an old gas station, the space has been transformed into an awesome sports bar, with the BEST outdoor patio in town! DIG in the Park is a comfortable place to have a cold beer, chat with friends, or just watch the game. DIG’s North Charleston location is in the heart of Olde Towne Park Circle.
